name: @nanolink/nanolink-tools
description: Toolbox for integrating with nanolink infrastructure

scripts.showdoc: docker run -d --rm --name ntdoc -p 8083:80 ntdoc && start http://localhost:8083
scripts.doc: docker build -t ntdoc . && docker run -d --rm --name ntdoc -p 8083:80 ntdoc && start http://localhost:8083
